title: Query the NHS TRUD API
text: Retrieve available endpoints: Get metadata item: Download item:

ℹ 18 more rows #> # ℹ 14 more variables: archiveFileSha256 <chr>, #> #   archiveFileLastModifiedTimestamp <chr>, checksumFileUrl <chr>, #> #   checksumFileName <chr>, checksumFileSizeBytes <int>, #> #   checksumFileLastModifiedTimestamp <chr>, signatureFileUrl <chr>, #> #   signatureFileName <chr>, signatureFileSizeBytes <int>, #> #   signatureFileLastModifiedTimestamp <chr>, publicKeyFileUrl <chr>, … #>  #> $httpStatus #> [1] 200 #>  #> $message #> [1] "OK" # by default this will be downloaded to the current working directory if (FALSE) {   download_item(1799) }

title: Download NHS TRUD item — download_item
text: Downloads files specified NHS TRUD item (requires subscription). default latest release.

title: Download NHS TRUD item — download_item
code: download_item(   item,   directory = ".",   download_file = "archive",   TRUD_API_KEY = NULL,   release = NULL )

title: Download NHS TRUD item — download_item
text: item integer, item downloaded. directory Path directory item downloaded . set current working directory default. download_file item file downloaded. Valid values: "archive" (release item) "checksum" "signature" "publickKey" TRUD_API_KEY string. name environmental variable containing TRUD API key. NULL (default) assumed called TRUD_API_KEY. release name specific release ID downloaded (can ascertained using get_item_metadata()). NULL (default), latest item release downloaded.

title: Download NHS TRUD item — download_item
text: file path downloaded file, returned invisibly.

what: Retrieve metadata for a NHS TRUD item — get_item_metadata
title: Retrieve metadata for a NHS TRUD item — get_item_metadata
text: Sends request release list endpoint, returning list metadata pertaining specified NHS TRUD item.

title: Retrieve metadata for a NHS TRUD item — get_item_metadata
Retrieve metadata for a NHS TRUD item — get_item_metadata
text: item integer, item downloaded. TRUD_API_KEY string. name environmental variable containing TRUD API key. NULL (default) assumed called TRUD_API_KEY. latest_only TRUE, metadata pertaining latest item release retrieved. default set FALSE.

title: Retrieve metadata for a NHS TRUD item — get_item_metadata
Retrieve metadata for a NHS TRUD item — get_item_metadata

text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.
